```{r setup}
library(MetaboAnnotation)
library(tidyverse)

ms1_data <- read_tsv(system.file("MS1_example.txt", package = "MetaboAnnotation"))

cmpds <- read_tsv(system.file("LipidMaps.txt", package = "MetaboAnnotation"))

result <- annotateMz(ms1_data, cmpds, adducts = c("[M+H]+", "[M+Na]+", "[M+NH4]+"), tolerance = 0.005, ppm = 0)

```
